description: Data engineering, analysis, and ML components including CSV/Excel analysis

PipelineStatus.description: Data pipeline status showing stages, health, and throughput.

PipelineDetails.description: Detailed pipeline view with stages and history.

SchemaDefinition.description: Data schema definition with fields and types.

SchemaField.description: A field in a data schema.

DataQualityMetrics.description: Data quality metrics showing completeness, accuracy, and freshness.

QualityIssue.description: A data quality issue requiring attention.

LineageGraph.description: Data lineage graph showing data flow from sources to targets.

LineageNode.description: A node in the lineage graph.

ModelCard.description: ML model card with performance metrics and metadata.

ModelDetails.description: Detailed model view with metrics and history.

FeatureStore.description: Feature store showing available ML features.

FeatureDefinition.description: An ML feature definition with computation logic.

NumbersDashboard.description: Central dashboard for data analysis and exploration.

DataTable.description: Interactive data table with sorting, filtering, and pagination.

TableToolbar.description: Toolbar with table actions and filters.

QueryEditor.description: SQL query editor with syntax highlighting and autocomplete.

QueryToolbar.description: Query editor toolbar with run and format actions.

QueryResult.description: Display SQL query results with execution info.

SchemaView.description: Display detected schema for a data file.

SchemaExplorer.description: Interactive schema browser with column details.

StatsPanel.description: Panel showing statistics for multiple columns.

BarChart.description: Bar chart visualization for categorical data.

LineChart.description: Line chart for time series or continuous data.

DataQualityReport.description: Data quality assessment showing issues and recommendations.

JoinBuilder.description: Visual join configuration for multiple datasets.

DataPreview.description: Quick preview of data with limited rows.

show-models.description: Show ML models and their status
